pageTitle: LONP1 - Lon protease homolog, mitochondrial precursor - Homo sapiens (Human)
textBeforeTable: See also OMIM:600373 Disease descriptionA rare syndrome characterized by the combination of cerebral, ocular, dental, auricular, and skeletal features. These include developmental delay, craniofacial anomalies, cataracts, ptosis, median nasal groove, delayed tooth eruption, hearing loss, short stature, delayed epiphyseal ossification, metaphyseal hip dysplasia, and vertebral coronal clefts. The disease is caused by mutations affecting the gene represented in this entry. INVOLVEMENT IN CODASS, VARIANTS CODASS ALA-476; VAL-670; CYS-672; HIS-679; SER-749; GLU-767 AND ILE-927 DEL.
